inn1.comm: good line and length delivery to start with, Amla defends solidly.
defended solidly off the frontfoot again. Some good away-swing from Mpofu.
short and wide. Cut powerfully by Amla but unfortunately hits it straight to the fielder at point.
driven to cover point this time. Not timed too well. Just used the outside half of the bat there.
no shot offered by Amla this time. No real pace there, but good areas.
half-volley just outside off. Just punched through the covers,but not too powerfully. Outfield still a bit wet following last night's showers. But they get three easily.
no shot offered first up. Just checking out the movement first.
beautifull driven, but straight to cover. A bit too full from Chibhabha, lucky to get away with that.
pushed to cover and sets off for a quick single. Another half-volley. Amla would feel that he missed out there.
short and straight and Smith glances the ball down to fine leg. Deep square leg has to come around to do the fielding.
defended off the backfoot towards point.
short and straight again, this time Smith rocks onto the backfoot and pulls the ball away powerfully for the first boundary of this innings.
another half-volley. Amla drives the ball straight back to the bowler.
full and straight. Strayed onto the pads and Amla whips the ball through midwicket without to much effort. Beautiful stroke.
half-volley once more, punched to cover and sets off for the quick single, makes it easily but the throw is not backed up and the ball races away for an extra four over-throws.
feeling for it a bit outside of. smith just hangs the bat out and will be dissapointed with that.Nearly got the edge there.
defended solidly off the frontfoot. Better head-movement from Smith this time.
Smith gets far across and sensibly lets the ball go without offering a shot.
another halfvolley outside off. This time Amla hits it straight through the gap at extra cover. Perfectly timed.
solidly defended off the frontfoot
flicked to mid-on off the backfoot.
short again, defended off the backfoot.
driven straight to mid-off this time. No single taken.
good delivery to end off the over. Defended solidly off the backfoot.
miss-timed drive from Smith. Fielded in the covers.
short and wide, worked down to third man easily.
pushed to mid-off off the frontfoot and immediately sets off for the single. Well-run.
short off a length and straight. Smith defends off the frontfoot.
goes acrossthe stumps,but the ball just slides down leg side.
full and outside off. Smith defends once more.
this time defended off the backfoot. Good over from Mpofu.
driven to mid-on. Full and slightly too straight. Lucky to get away without conceding a boundary there.
another quick single taken to mid-off.
defended away to cover-point. Nice and straight from Chibhabha.
cut away powerfully, short and wide delivery. Smith misses out there, hit it straight to the fielder at backward point.
driven to mid-on. The pitch playing a bit slower than Smith anticipated.
driven to cover this time. Another over gone well for Zimbabwe.
Amla goes across the line, think he might have gotten an inside edge, otherwise the LBW might have came into concideration.
flicked to the on-side for an easy single.
defended to the off-side again.
full and straight, defended wisely by Smith again. A bit quick on his shots today from Smith. Needs to calm down a bit.
beautiful stroke from Smith. Straight drive smacked straight back past the bowler. Excellent timing from Smith this time.
another good drive from Smith. Fielded well at cover though.
good delivery from Chibhabha. Defended well by Amla.
sweetly driven but well fielded at mid-off saving a definite boundary.
full and just outside off. Almost a half-volley and Smith pounces the ball through extra-cover.
driven on the up to cover this time. A bit too adventurous from Smith maybe.
another short of a length delivery. Driven by Smith again but straight to mid-off.
walks down the track and in the end has to reach for the ball a bit as it is wide outside off but makes contact and the ball races to the deep cover fence. Excellent shot.
flicked out to deep square leg with the wrists.
short and straight, pulled away to deep square leg this time. Long-leg comes around to do the fielding.
flicked off the backfoot this time, straight to mid-wicket though.
driven off the backfoot but straight to cover. just not picking the gaps today are the Proteas' opening pair.
too straight again, flick of the wrists sees the ball running down to fine leg. Long-leg comes around to do the cleaning up.
good delivery to end off the over. Defended solidly off the backfoot straight back at the bowler.
worked past point and down to third man. Keeper standing up to the stumps now. Good move from Taibu.
defended away to the off-side. Good line and length from Chibhabha.
flicked withgreat power to mid-wicket. Well fielded but a fumble give the Proteas a chance to take the single.
solid forward defence.
gives himself some romm and powerfully drives the ball straight to cover.
good delivery to end off the over, full and straight, right up there in the blockhole.
no shot offered from Amla this time.
attempted drive off the backfoot, a bit too close to his body though.
short and straight, flicked off the backfoot straight to mid-wicket.
just too straight, legbye brings up the 50 partnership.
big one! Smith comes down the track and smacks it over deep mid-wicket into the trees.
another boundary for Smith. This time going through mid-wicket again, but not going for the maximum.
first ball from Price is knocked down the ground to long-on.
swept straight to square leg.
flicked to midwicket this time.
another attempted sweep. Smith gets far in front and the solitary appeal from Price is turned down.
solid forward defence.
swept to square leg once more. An excellent dive from the fielder saves the boundary. Very good over from Price.
cut straight to cover-point.
thick inside edge onto the pads from Amla as he attempts to dorive early up.
no foot movement from Amla. Attempted drive.
driven down to long-off, not timed well at all though.
well bowled by Utseya, Smith goes for the late-cut, nearly gets the little edge through to the keeper.
worked down to long-on for a single to end off the over.
tickled around the corner to short 45.
one-bounce four for Smith. Gives himself some room and smashed to ball over cover.

Smith goes for the big slog-sweep but hits it too flat right down the throaght of the fielder down at deep square leg. The introduction of spin then was effective in getting the first wicket. The South African skipper has to go and that would be very dissapointing for him.
defended off the frontfoot first up
another solid defensive shot from de Viliers
arm-ball from Price. De Villiersjust defends wisely.
worked down to long-on for an easy single for Amla. keeps rotating the strike.
play and miss from De Villiers,
driven back to the bowler.
driven down to long-on this time.
gives himself some room and the short delivery is hammered past point.
driven down to long-on off the backfoot. Just nudging the ball around and rotating the strike.
flicked to short-45.
defended straight back to bowler.
worked around to square leg, thoughts of a quick single turned down wisely.
punched down to long on once more.
another single to end off the over.
comes down the trackand flicks the ball to mid-on.
defended back to the bowler off the backfoot.
flicked past short 45 and down to long on.
driven beautifully, but straight to cover.
punched down to long-on. Another good over from Zimbabwe. Drinks will now be taken.
cut hard straight to cover.
punched down the ground to long-on for another easy single.
punched down the ground once more, to long-off this time though.
flicked to mid-wicket, timed too well this time though. No single this time.
timed to perfection as De Villiers hammers it past cover. No chance for the fielder. Even the big dive couldn't save the boundary.
worked down to long on and rotates the strike.
worked down to long-off this time.
edges and just flies past the keeper, no slips in place either and the ball runs halfway down to third man.
beuatiful shot to end off the over, in-to-out drive over cover. Beautiful execution of a very difficult shot.
punched down the ground once more.
solid defence. Well bowled by Price. Full and straight.
comes down the track and punches the ball down to long-on and that brings up the 100 for the Proteas.
on-drive to long-on this time.
Amla gets on the frontfoot and smears that to the deep square leg fence. Beautiful sweepshot against the turn. Gets rewarded with a boundary.
down the track and out to deep mid-wicket.
defended off the frontfoot.
flicked out to mid-wicket.
flicked once more, hits the gap this time though.
tickled around the corner to short-45 this time, not enough time to get a quick single though.
driven down the ground and an easy single is picked up.
flicked out to mid-wicket.
good half-century for Amla, staking his claim at the top of the South African order.
another single to end off the over, rotating the strike all the time.
punched down the ground in similar fashion to long-on.
defended off the frontfoot.
down the ground and goes over the top. High and mighty and that brings up the 50 partnership between De Villiers and Amla.
rotates the strike once more and gets another easy single.
good delivery to end off the over.
chipped over mid-off and they scamper a quick one.
well-struck cover drive. some good fielding on the boundary prevents a second.
driven down to long-off
nearly chopped on there by Amla attempting to cut one that was slightly too close to his body.
another single to end off the over.
defended off the backfoot.
driven powerfully but straight to cover this time.
this time the cover drive beats the fielder and races to the fence. Powerfully driven by De Villiers there.
shortish and straight and De Villiers flicks the ball past deep square leg.
flicked to square leg for an easy single.
missed and hits the pads but too high to be a risk for lbw.
solid forward defence.
driven down to long-off and another easy single for De Villiers
punched down the ground once more for another single.
driven to cover, well fielded.
pushed down the ground to long-on this time.
flicked past mid-wicket.
defended off the frontfoot.
full and straight and Amla flicks the ball out to the deep midwicket fence. Deep square leg comes around to do the fielding.
flicked to square leg this time.
50 runs up for AB De Villiers, that is his 20th half-century or the Proteas in ODI's.
full and straight, driven straight to mid-off.
full and straight, flicked straight to square leg.
comes down the track and smacks it over cover. Beautiful shot for another boundary, that brings up the 150.
driven out to cover.
turned away to midwicket.
inside-out over cover once more.
wides down leg, missed by the keeper.
punched down the ground once more.
paddle-sweep to short-45.
comes down the track and driven down to long-off.
great catch down at long-off by Vermeulen. De Villiers attempts to go over the top but doesn't get enough bat on the ball. Good innings from De Villiers comes to an end.
flicked to square leg and gets the newbatsman, Mark Boucher on strike.
solid forward defence.
solid forward defence.
flicked to the onside and gets an easy single.
solid forward defence.
punched down the ground for another rotate of the strike.
short and wide, cut powerfully past point and gets a boundary as reward.
defended to the on-side
pulled away
driven out to the deep for a quick single.
defended off the frontfoot.
flicked away to deep square leg.
turned away to the on-side for a quick single.
flicked onto the leg-side.
punched down the ground to long on.
walks down the track and heaves the ball over mid-wicket for a one-bounce four.
beautiful cover drive but a great dive saves the boundary and no run scored in the end.
defended away to point to end off a good over for South Africa.
oh no, Amla chucks away a century as he miss-times a long-hop from Cremer. Pulled straight down the throaght of the man down at the deep mid-wicket fence.
defended off the frontfoot.
short and widish, Petersen gives himself some room and hammers the ball past point and watches it race to the fence.
solid forward defence.
pushed to point and they scramble a quick one after a fumble by the fielder.
beautiful little late-cut, just runs it down to third man.
short and straight, attempted pull, missed out.
punched down the ground and rotates the strike.
keeps on rotating the strike and getting themselves settled for the last couple of overs.
driven down the ground to long-off for another easy single.
flicked off the frontfoot to midwicket.
flicked to the on-side once more. Just straying a bit too straight.
short and straight, pulled powerfully out to Vermeulen at deep mid-wicket. One-bounce.
worked away to the on-side once more.
leading edge as Boucher looks to turn a straight one down to fine leg. Only just falls safe at cover.
pushed to cover-point into the gap for another single to end off the over.
wide down leg
swept straight to square leg.
another catch hit straight down Vermeulen's throaght. This time Boucher goes down the track and over the top but straight to long-off. Vermeulen makes no mistake and Price picks up another one.
punched down to long-on.
reverse sweep to point, gets a quick one though.
play and miss rom Morkel, nearly got the outside edge.
short and wide, a bit more time, cuts it out to deep extra cover.
solid forward defence.
punched down to ground to long-on
driven off the backfoot past extra cover and good quick running gets them the second only just.
flicked to mid-wicket, thought of a single but wisely declining the offer.
lured onto the frontfoot and didn't pick the wrong-one, nearly catastrophe for Petersen.
guided down nicely to third man.
defended off the backfoot.
defended off the backfoot once more. Short and straight from Price.
driven straight to mid-wicket. Not rewarded for a good shot due to bad placing.
short and straight this time. Punched down to long-on.
another couple for Petersen to end off the over.
cut away off the backfoot to deep cover.
worked dout to long-on for another single, strike keeps rotating.
attempted drive off the backfoot, miss-timed though.
defended away to mid-on.
once again worked away to mid-on, good fielding, but a slight fumble causes the unwanted single for the Proteas.
wide down leg first up. Pessure on the bowler telling here.
right up in the blockhole.
muscled down to long-off.
right up there in the blockhole once more. Very well bowled.
driven straight to mid-off this time.
beamer, down leg as well. Attempted yorker one has to think.
short and straight, pulled down to long leg.
in the blockhole once more, driven down to long-on. Well bowled.
worked away to long-on for an easy single.
driven to mid-off.
worked out to long-off once more.
worked away for another single.
worked down the ground for another single.
flicked straight to short 45. Just 5 off the over.
right in the blockhole again, turned away to cover-point.
slower ball, very effective as Petersen is unable to put it away.
half-volley, just outside off, hammered through the covers.
another boundary, hammered through the covers once more.
worked to deep midwicket. easy single.
full-toss, Morkel picks it up and hits one of his trademark-maximums.
worked down the ground to long-on.
short and wide, cut away powerfully for another boundary. Zimbabwe losing a bit of dicipline now.
another full-toss, not pu away as Morkel miss-times it a bit.
another full-toss, Petersen works it out to long-on.
there he goes again. morkel hits another maximum over deep mid-wicket and that also brings up the team's 250.
worked away straight to shortish third man.
worked down the ground and gives Morkel strike.
flat and hard. Smacked over the top this time. Another big one for the Proteas.
driven down the ground and rotates the strike this time.
wide down leg, missed by the keeper.
rotates strike once more as Petersen muscles the ball down the ground.
really powerful hitting by Morkel, full-toss smacked right in between long on and long off.
worked down to long-on once more. That is the end of the Powerplay too.
worked down to long-on for a single and gets Petersen on strike.
big appeal for lbw, hits just a bit too high and might be sliding down leg.
beautifully played little reverse sweep.
pushed to the vacant on-side.
well-bowled, forced to defend that one.
play and miss from Morkel, good spell from Price comes to an end.
half-volley, smacked down to long-off
right up there in the block-hole.
hammered down the ground, hard running from Petersen rewarded with a second run. morkel retains the strike.
fine little edge, runs past the keeper and gets another boundary.
carved away to the deep, one-bounce to the man at mid-wicket.
Petersen attempts to go over the top, Cremer at the long-on fence takes a good catch running backwards. Petersen's good innings comes to an end.
driven down the ground and gets an easy single and Morkel into strike.
right up in the blockhole once more and Morkel gets his second half-century in ODI's.
exceptional paddle-sweep from McLaren and the ball runs away to the fine leg fence.
hammered straight to mid-wicket.
right up in the block-hole.
driven down the ground for a single to end off the innings.

inn2.comm: good delivery first up from Tsotsobe
no shot offered
no shot offered once more
no shot offered
driven down to third man with an open blade.
driven straight to midon
solid forward defence.
inside edge, fielded by the keeper.
flicked through midwicket for an easy couple.
bouncer, well avoided.
attempted cover-drive, miss-timed this time though.
play and miss, good line and lenght.
swing ad miss once more
yet another swing, this time gets the edge and Boucher puts it down.
defended to cover point.
driven past cover, stops just before the fence.
defended off the frontfoot to end off the over
just too straight, worked away to the on-side.
cut down to third man.

attempted pull, lofted up to mid-off but drops just short of Amla.
defended a bit better this time
defended a bit better this time
slower ball defended off the backfoot.
finally Tsotsobe is rewarded with a wicket. Slower ball luring Vermeulen to go over the top and is miss-timed straight to Amla at mid-off.
worked away to the onside
defended to cover point.
worked down to deepish third man.
solid forward defence.
defended off the frontfoot once more.
worked to deep square leg, just too straight.
defended to gulley this time.
swing and miss.
huge appeal for lbw, not given. Very close.
driven to mid-on, no single though.
defended away to the cover region
defended to the onside.
stepped down the track and smacked the ball through midwicket. First boundary for Zimbabwe.
another boundary, this time a beautiful straight drive.
solid forward defence.
defended away to the off-side
diving save at mid-off, very well fielded. Good drive again from Chibhabha
defended away to backward point.
swing and miss, not a smart stroke that from Masakadza
pushed past point and down to third man.
loose stroke again, this time getting inside half of the bat on it and the ball trickles to mid-on.
guided to third man, but the gully-fielder makes a greaat diving save.
driven to md-off off the backfoot.
driven straight back to the bowler who takes a shye at the stumps, if that had hit, it would've been gone.
swing and miss, well bowled by Tsotsobe
swing and miss again.
worked down to third man and Langeveldt makes a good save down on the fence.
defended off the backfoot, good over from Tsotsobe comes to an end. Zimbabwe struggling.
short and straight, just nicked the gloves on it's way through and runs down to the fine leg fence.
defended off the backfoot this time.
defended well off the frontfoot.
worked square of third man past point and manages a couple.
defended away to point
good inswinger for a first delivery in international cricket. no shot offered.
short and straight, pulled away to deep mid-wicket.
and McLaren gets his first ODI wicket on just his 3rd delivery. A bit high and moving towards the leg-side, but umpire Rudi Koertzen lifts the finger.
gets off the mark first up. Worked to the on-side.
defended off the frontfoot.
solid forward defence once more, some real in-swing from the debutant.
good line and length, no shot offered.
short and hammerd to the covers, well fielded by Alviro Petersen.
short and striahgt, worked off the hip to square leg.
attempted slower delivery and that's a wide.
better delivery this time, excellent length and  aking the batsman play.
short, pulld out to deep square leg.
solid forward defence.
powered straight back at the bowler and hits the non-striker.
slower delivery fooling Masakadza.
angled down to third man
edged and well taken by Boucher, diving to his right.
no shot offered
play and miss this time around.
walks down the track, smacks the ball through mid-wicket.
no shot offered.
driven to Petersen at cover.
worked around to fine leg. Just straying too straight by Botha.
full and straight, driven out to mid-wicket.
punched out to mid-wicket
driven straigt back to the bowler.
another good take by Boucher. Steyn luring him into the drive, gets the edge and Boucher makes no mistake.
bouncer from Steyn, first up.
bouncer from Steyn, very well bowled.
full and straight, inside edge and the ball runs to fine leg.
another good take by Boucher. Steyn luring him into the drive, gets the edge and Boucher makes no mistake.
solid forward defence
driven back to the bowler.
solid forward defence.
pushed out to mid-on.
solid defence off the frontfoot once more.
defended off the frontfoot once more
full and outside off, square drive past point and the ball races to the fence.
short and straight, worked off the hips to square leg.
short and straight, swing and miss this time
worked down to third man for an easy single.
solid forward defence.
swept away fine tofine leg.
defended off the frontfoot
short and straight, worked down to fine leg.
guided down to third man.
good fielding by Petersen saves a couple.
driven straight to extra cover this time
single to the leg side to end off the over.
Solid forward defence, coming down the track.
wide down leg, Boucher quick with the hands, goes for the stumping, not out.
worked to square leg off the backfoot.
full and straight, driven straight back at the bowler.
cut to deepish gully off the backfoot, shortish from botha
another good line and length delivery from Botha
attempted to flick the ball off his legs, missed.
defended off the frontfoot
thick inside edge in an attempt to defend off the backfoot.
attempted guide down to third man, fielded well at backward foot.
raps the pads on the way through, legbye down to fine leg.
driven out to the off-side sweeper.
flicked out to deep mid-wicket where Amla does the fielding.
paddle-swept over the keeper. Short-45 does the fielding,
uses the feet and flicks the ball out to deep square leg, direct hit from the fence, but safe.
driven straight back to the bowler.
atempted reverse-sweep,misses.
driven down the ground to long-on.
full and straight, flicked out to mid-wicket.
flicked to mid-wicket once more.
driven out to deep cover.
a bit too short, attempted bouncer but just strays down leg.
another wide down leg.
cut down to a widish third man and gets a walkable single.
cut straight to point
defended off the frontfoot to the legside.
worked away to the leg-side one more
comes dow nthe track and drives the ball down to long-on.
reverse-sweep from Taibu, executed quite well.
defended off the backfoot.
defended off the frontfoot once more. Zimbabwe not even putting in an effort to make this total.
edged onto the pads and the ball runs down to third man for a single.
attempted guide down to third man, ends up in the hands of backward point off the second bounce.
McLaren appeal for lbw all by himself, that hit him a bit high and was going down leg.
into the body once more, hits him right next to the thighpad in the groin area, that can hurt.
flicked out to midwicket for another easy single.
forward defence
forward defence once more
defended off the front foot.
full and straight,defended again.
defended off the front foot
worked away to backward point
starts off with a wide, not the start he'd have wanted.
half-volley straying into the pads. Driven beautifully past mid-on.
worked away past cover point. Rain starting to fall now as well.
defended off the frontfoot, rain getting harder now too.
defended away to point.
thumped to cover-point, quite a slow delivery from Morkel.
thickish inside edge runs down to fine and the umpires have called for the covers. So there will be a rain delay..
guided straight to short 45 on the off-side.
defended off the backfoot, straight to the bowler.
driven down to long-on
comes down the track and defends.
driven out to the off-side sweeper.
whipped away fine, ground to be made by deep square leg and they pick up an easy couple.
short and straightish, worked away to backward point.
defended into the ground, the ball bounces hard over the bowler's head and they get a single.
defended off the frontfoot this time.
shortish again, worked away past cover point and that brings up the Zimbabwean 100.
flicked over mid-wicket, outfield quite slow following the rain. Only picks up two.
steered down to third man.
solid forward defence.
driven straight back to the bowler.
attempted slower ball, wide down leg side though.
huge swing, angling away from the batsman, nearly got an edge there.
defended off the back foot again.
defended off the frontfoot towards the on-side.
flicked out to mid-wicket.
ran down to third man with an open blade.
bouncer, ducked under it well.
fullish and straight again, worked away to mid-wicket.
slower delivery, dropping to 110 km/h. Defended off the frontfoot.
rips into the gloves of Taibu with some extra bounce. Easy sin gle to mid-wicket.
right up in the blockhole. defended back to the bowler.
opens the front leg, gives himself some room and attempt the big heave over mid-wicket. miss-timed though.
cut down to third man taking the aerial route, falls safely though.
driven straight back to the bowler.
thick edge speeds down to the third man fence and that's a welcome boundary for Zimbabwe.
forward defence.
solid defence off the backfoot.
guided down to third man.
short and straight, gives himself some room and smacks the ball over cover, two bounces and the ball hits the fence.
wide down leg, Steyn going for the feet and just pushed it wide.
worked down to third man.
worked away to the leg side.
smacked back to the bowler
first big one for the Zimbabweans, just opens the hips and swings hard, hit it nearly in the middle and onto the embankment.
good effort from Amla on the fence, same shot from Taibu, just miss-timed this time.
this time whipped over square leg and the ball races to the fence.
right up in the blockhole, pushed to cover-point.
stopped half by Smith at mid-on, did well to save the boundary.
nearly chopped the yorker onto his stumps as he tried to block it out.
driven to mid-off.
thumped over mid-off, attempted pull, a bit too late on the shot though.
pushed out to mid-on.
pushed out to cover-point, not risking the single this time.
right up in the blockhole, attempted cover-drive, missed out.
bouncer to finish off the over.
worked to the on-side.
defended away to point.
driven out to the deep extra cover fence.
guided down to third man to bring up his half-century.
big appeal from McLaren for LBW, a bit high though and might just be sliding down leg stump.
driven down the ground and that brings up the 100 PArtnership.
just a bit too straight from Langeveldt, worked away to square leg.
worked away to midwicket this time.
thickish edge flies over fine leg and brings up another maximum
attempting to go over the top, falls just short of Smith at mid-off.
another yorker, comes down the track, hits the ball on the full and races to deep dquare leg.
worked away for another single to end off the over.
sliced over backward point and the ball flies down to third man.
swing and miss just outside off.
bit too straight, worked away to deep square leg.
driven to mid-off off the backfoot, nearly a chance of caught-and-bowled there.
short and slow, chipped over mid-wicket for an easy couple.
single out to mid-on to finish the over. attempted yorker.
driven to cover off the backfoot.
chopped to long-on and a diving Steyn can't get to the ball, drops just short.
short and straight, pulled out to deep square leg.
uppish driv to mid-off, falls short again as Smith is quite deep.
short and straight, pulled out to Morkel in the deep, as he fumbles they set off for a second.
driven straight back to the bowler who miss-fields. Taibu wants to set off for a quick single, wisely sent back by Matsikenyeri
full-toss from Botha, hammered over the top.
another full-toss, this time only getting to long-on. That's his 13th half-century in ODI's.
flicked around to fine leg.
pushed out to deep extra cover, gets a easy second too. No real intensity from South Africa here.
got to the pitch off the ball and just smacked it through mid-wicket.
double-steps and smacks this one straight over Botha's head and hits another boundary.
flicked out to mid-wicket.
short and wide, no shot offered, no wide called.
right in the blockhole, squeezed out to third man.
driven straight back to Langeveldt.
driven to cover, trouble if it hits at the keeper's end, would've been gone for all money, and gets an over-throw as consolation.
defended off the front-foot.
worked out to third man.
attempted reverse-sweep.
driven to mid-on, quick single scampered
worked out to midwicket.
worked away to midwicket once more.
pulled out to deep square leg, just walks a single. Taibu seems to have some sort of injury.
full toss smacked straight over AB De Villiers' head.
good yorker by Steyn to follow up the full toss
attempts to go across to work the ball to fine leg, missedcompletely.
worked down to third man this time.
driven out to cover point, De Villiers takes a shye at the non-striker's end, but misses, no back-up and they get an over-throw.
slashed away over cover-point.
too straight and Taibu flicks the ball down to long leg fence.
worked down to third man.
inside edge, runs down to fine leg.
short and wide, hammered over cover-point for a maximum.
worked out to mid-wicket.
driven down to long-off. Gets an asy single to end off the over.
good yorker from Steyn just outside off.
another boundary, this time an edge that just beats the keeper, seemed to be intentional.
pulled away powerfully to long-on, Langeveldt makes some ground to make the save. Rain returning now too.
square drive straight to de Villiers who makes a good diving save.
quick bouncer given as a wide.
driven straight to cover this time. not even concidering a single as Petersen is on the ball in a flash.
defended out to cover point.
worked out to long-on. thinks about a second but wisely declines.
half-volley outside off, Taibu smashes the ball past cover and the ball races to the fence.
full-toss on the off and worked away with ease to long-on.
worked out to cover for another single.
driven straight back down the ground, not timed well though.
finally the 188run-partnership is broken with an in-swinging yorker. Matsikenyeri departs for 86 runs. Excellent knock comes to an end.
driven to cover for an easy single as all the fielder are on the edge of the ring.
rotates the strike by running the ball down to third man.
worked down to third man with a great little late cut.
swing and miss from Cremer. Steyn's pace just too much.
driven out to cover. Miss-field,but no run taken.
driven out to third man. Could've gotten two if they had ran hard, but Taibu choosing to keep the strike being 7 shy of his century.
short of a length and straight, flicked over the square leg fielder and goes all the way.
defended off the frontfoot and not taking any chances with a single.
what an innings from the little man. Worked off his thigh, gets an easy single. A great innings from the seasoned cricketer.
real sloppy from South Africa. Really no great effort here this afternoon from the Proteas.
Worked off his hips again to get another couple.
flicked to square leg to end of the innings.
